content:
Position: Browser Extension Developer

Salary: Not specified

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
- Proven experience in developing browser extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
- Familiarity with WebExtensions API and experience with mobile browsers' limitations and capabilities
- Experience with version control systems, preferably Git
- Knowledge of web security and data protection principles
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Strong communication and teamwork abilities
- Experience with React mobile development frameworks or technologies

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain browser extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari across desktop and mobile platforms
- Collaborate with the design team to implement intuitive UI/UX for the extensions
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility and address platform-specific limitations
- Integrate extensions with backend services for comment syncing, user authentication, and data storage
- Implement security best practices to protect user data and privacy
- Stay updated with the latest trends in browser extension development and propose innovative features to enhance user engagement
- Conduct thorough testing across different browsers and devices to ensure functionality and user experience consistency
- Respond to user feedback and make necessary adjustments to extension features

Location: Vinnytsia, Ukraine

Company: Gemicle

Links: [Gemicle Website](gemicle.com)
Write short version with: company name: , position: , salary: , requirements: , location: , links: .

Djinni Candidates Jobs Salaries Log In Sign Up √ó Error All jobs Development JavaScript / Front-End React.js Kyiv There was an error. Reload the page and try again. Strong Middle - Senior React Native Developer $2000-3000 Brights We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled to join our dynamic team ‚ú® Requirements: ‚Ä¢ Exprience with JS ES6+, HTML and CSS; ‚Ä¢ Experience with React Native development; ‚Ä¢ Experience with Git, CI/CD, and related tools; ‚Ä¢ Experience in developing mobile applications for the App Store or Google Play Store; ‚Ä¢ Understanding of Redux and its basic principles; ‚Ä¢ Understanding of the life cycle of an application and library components; ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of basic software development patterns and key principles of software development; ‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills; ‚Ä¢ Excellent time management skills and ability to adapt to a fast-paced work environment Would be a plus: ‚Ä¢ Understanding of the back-end architecture; ‚Ä¢ Ability to plan a project's architecture and development stages. We offer: ‚Ä¢ Transparent financial motivation 2000-3000$; ‚Ä¢ Comfortable workplace at our office in the center of Kyiv (remote work is possible); ‚Ä¢ 18 working days of paid leave annually; ‚Ä¢ Unlimited sick days; ‚Ä¢ Salary review twice a year; ‚Ä¢ Compensation for our English-speaking club ‚Äî 100%; ‚Ä¢ Compensation for coworking spaces ‚Äî 100%; ‚Ä¢ Compensation for gym memberships and professional courses ‚Äî 80% (after the trial period); ‚Ä¢ Compensation for any English courses ‚Äî 50% (after the trial period); ‚Ä¢ Compensation for sessions with a psychologist ‚Äî 50% (after the trial period); ‚Ä¢ Medical insurance (after the trial period). Interview Stages: Screening Interview ‚û°Ô∏è Technical Interview ‚û°Ô∏è Job Offer If you have the skills, passion, and determination we‚Äôre looking for, apply now to become part of our exciting journey ‚≠êÔ∏è About Brights We are a medium-sized software company with streamlined business processes and zero bureaucracy. Currently, we have a team of 100 professionals and the number of our employees continues to increase by an average of 30% a year. The company was founded in 2011 and had already completed more than 400 projects for clients from different parts of the world ‚Äî Europe, America, and Australia. We develop a variety of custom solutions for process automation for large companies and also build startups from scratch. The vast majority of these projects are turnkey: we develop a strategy, conduct research, and then carry out prototyping, designing, developing, and testing. All of our engineers can directly influence the final product, solutions, and architecture. After a year or two, we encourage engineers to rotate to another project for further skills development and an increase in job satisfaction. Our key technologies are vue.js, react, asp.net core, php, node.js, sq. What we offer to our employees: 1. Great team. First of all, Brights is a people-oriented company. We are 100 professionals who truly love what they do. Every day we implement our ideas, create and develop projects together, and help each other. 2. Systemic and transparent processes. Due to the relatively small size of the company and the complete absence of bureaucracy, each employee has the opportunity to directly influence the processes and the result. 3. Comfortable working environment. Flexible working hours and unlimited work-from-home policy, 18 paid vacation days annually, and paid sick leave. Our office is located in the center of Kyiv where you can connect with your colleagues. 4. Opportunities for professional and personal growth. We offer constant communication with the mentor, performance reviews, compensations for English classes and professional courses, and HR support ‚Äì all these factors contribute to the development of each employee. 5. The possibility to rotate between projects to ensure constant progress in order to find a position that helps you to embrace your full potential. 6. Team building events two times a year as well as team kayaking, skiing, yoga classes, etc. We enjoy spending time together! 7. Health care. We provide compensation for gym memberships and various sports events. Position: Middle - Senior React Native Developer 
Salary: $2000-3000 
Requirements: 
- Experience with JS ES6+, HTML and CSS 
- Experience with React Native development 
- Experience with Git, CI/CD, and related tools 
- Experience in developing mobile applications for the App Store or Google Play Store 
- Understanding of Redux and its basic principles 
- Understanding of the life cycle of an application and library components 
- Knowledge of basic software development patterns and key principles of software development 
- Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills 
- Excellent time management skills and ability to adapt to a fast-paced work environment 
Would be a plus: 
- Understanding of the back-end architecture 
- Ability to plan a project's architecture and development stages 

Responsibilities: 
- Transparent financial motivation of $2000-3000 
- Comfortable workplace at the office in the center of Kyiv (remote work is possible) 
- 18 working days of paid leave annually 
- Unlimited sick days 
- Salary review twice a year 
- Compensation for English-speaking club ‚Äî 100% 
- Compensation for coworking spaces ‚Äî 100% 
- Compensation for gym memberships and professional courses ‚Äî 80% (after the trial period) 
- Compensation for any English courses ‚Äî 50% (after the trial period) 
- Compensation for sessions with a psychologist ‚Äî 50% (after the trial period) 
- Medical insurance (after the trial period) 

Location: Kyiv, Ukraine 

Company: Brights 

Links: 
- Company website: http://brights.io 
- DOU company page: https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/brights/

Lead Full-Stack Developer.

Position: Full Stack Web Developer
Salary: Not specified (long-term contract work)
Requirements: 
- Proficient in JavaScript React/Next.js, Python, and PHP
- Experience with JQuery, JSON, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap
- Work experience as a WordPress and PHP developer preferred
- Knowledge of web technologies and UI/UX standards
- Experience developing RESTful APIs and integrating with 3rd Party APIs
- Proficient in code versioning tools such as Git, BitBucket
- Experience with AWS or another cloud service a plus
- Knowledge of CI/CD, TDD, and UI Testing Automation tools
- Familiarity with Project Management tools like Jira and Agile/Scrum

Responsibilities: 
- Understand business requirements and implement features
- Develop code following best practices for web applications
- Collaborate with the team to design and deliver functionality
- Ensure platform performance, quality, and responsiveness
- Maintain code quality, organization, and automation
- Provide feedback for continuous improvement

Location: Remote (outstaffing in Ukraine and United States)
Company: Ampelfy
Company Website: [https://www.ampelfy.com](https://www.ampelfy.com)
Company Profile on DOU: [https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/ampelfy/](https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/ampelfy/)

Note: The salary range is not specified, as it is for a long-term contract work. For specific details, interested candidates may need to inquire directly with the company.

Position: Middle React Developer/React Native 
Salary: Not specified 
Requirements: 
- 2.5+ years of experience in web development with at least 2 years in React and React Native
- Minimum 2 years of experience working in TypeScript 
- Comprehensive knowledge of React and React Native, including core principles 
- Experience with popular React.js and React Native workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
- Experience with Open Source Computer Vision Library 
- Deep understanding of OOP, SOLID, GRASP, KISS, and DRY principles 
- Good understanding of browser rendering behavior and performance, including mobile device rendering challenges 
- Good understanding of REST API and WebSockets 
- Good understanding of GIT 
- Strong problem-solving skills 
- Familiarity with the AWS ecosystem and IoT would be a plus 

Responsibilities: 
- Advise, design, and build cutting-edge software solutions using cloud technology 
- Specialize in providing modern software development and processes 
- Focus on building robust, scalable, and high-availability applications based on a wide range of Amazon Web Services 
- Cultivate a supportive atmosphere and constantly work on mastering skills for a deep understanding of technologies and industries 

Location: Odesa, Ukraine 

Company: Inmost 

Links: 
- More information: https://inmost.pro 
- Company website: http://inmost.pro/

position: Middle React Developer
salary: $2000-2500
requirements: Possess 3-5 years of front-end development experience with a strong emphasis on React.js and TypeScript. Demonstrated expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and contemporary JavaScript/ECMAScript standards. Deep understanding of React.js and TypeScript fundamentals, including state management, hooks, and the lifecycle of components. Proficient with React.js architecture (Flux or Redux) and adept at integrating with RESTful APIs. Skilled in utilizing front-end development tools and pipelines. Knowledge of CSS preprocessors like SASS or LESS. Experience with version control tools, notably Git.
responsibilities: Design and develop user-centric features with React.js and TypeScript, enhance component performance, improve web application responsiveness, collaborate with back-end developers and designers, document functional specifications, advocate for Test-Driven Development (TDD), stay updated on technological trends, contribute to tech strategy discussions.
location: Remote (Armenia, Azerbaijan, Spain, Poland, Ukraine)
company: Wild.Codes
links: [Company Website](https://wild.codes/), [DOU Company Page](https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/wild-codes/)
